Title: Avoiding Violations and Handling Complaints on Xiaohongshu
Content: To avoid violations on Xiaohongshu, it's essential to diversify your content. Instead of relying heavily on images, aim to post 20% text and images and 80% videos. Videos can be created by editing images into video format with background music and templates. This reduces the risk of being flagged for plagiarism. If you do get a complaint from the original content creator, handle it professionally. Contact them via WeChat and offer a small compensation, such as 200 to 1000 yuan, depending on your profit from the post. If the system flags your content for violations, delete it immediately to avoid further penalties. Posting regular, non-commercial content like scenic views can help restore your account's standing. If the situation is severe, consider creating a new account and following a structured posting strategy to regain traction.

Title: Using Original Content and Competitive Analysis
Content: Creating original content is crucial for long-term success on Xiaohongshu. Start by analyzing competitors and sourcing products from multiple suppliers to find the best quality and price. This allows you to create unique content that stands out. Initially, you can mimic successful posts to gain traction, but aim to innovate and develop your own style over time. Original content has the potential to go viral, providing significant exposure. Regularly update your content and keep an eye on market trends to stay relevant. By balancing imitation with innovation, you can build a strong presence on the platform.

Title: Managing Account Restrictions and Content Strategy
Content: Frequent use of the same cover images or content can lead to account restrictions on Xiaohongshu. To avoid this, diversify your content and regularly update your cover images. If your account gets restricted, create a new account and continue posting high-quality content. Use your main account to post scenic or aesthetically pleasing content to maintain activity and account health. Posting consistently, even if it's non-commercial content, helps keep your account active and reduces the risk of restrictions. By managing your content strategy effectively, you can maintain a healthy account and continue to grow your presence on the platform.
